title.narrative: Advanced Command and Staff Course - 40 per cent ODA

description.narrative: Advanced Command and Staff Course - is a postgraduate course for military and civilian personnel. The aim of the ACSC is to prepare selected military and civilian officers for senior positions by developing their analytical, decision-making and communication skills through the study of military, defence, political and ionternational affairs.

International Defence Education is recognised as a key element of Defence Engagement- impacting and contributing to Defence Diplomacy including capacity building, security sector reform, conflict prevention and stabilisation. The Defence Education programme aims to provide future leaders of international service personnel, police and civilians in the security sector with the skills that will enable them to make effective contributions to long-term institutional reform, conflict prevention and regional security. ﾠDefence Education benefits a broad variety of countries around the world and covers a range of courses, for each of which a different proportion is ODA eligible, reflecting the relevance to ODA purposes.
